entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
